name: Living From Home
description:
WARNING: THERE IS A BUZZING NOISE THAT INCREASES IN VOLUME

Controls:

Up: W or Up Arrow

Down: S or Down Arrow

Left: A or Left Arrow

Right: D or Right Arrow

Interaction: E or Space

This is a game based on how I felt during the 2020 Corona Virus Quarantine, mainly the first few months. While everyone in my family was safe and we thankfully didn't face financial insecurity, the quarantine caught us at a time when we were all separate. Thus the beginning of 2020 was lonely and I felt myself getting into a monotonous routine of locking myself in my room to be "productive" and to get schoolwork done, when in reality I just idled by and stressed over my twitter TL. When I realized this, I felt that I had no way to really express this routine, so I made this in hopes that someone gets what I'm saying.

This also was a test project to learn how to use Godot, which so far I like working in.

By Jorge Antonio Velasquez Belmonte
